attributes.action: save King Edward VII Upper School, Melton Mowbray from closure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a parent of a Year 7 student at King Edward VII i am very upset to hear the news of a proposed closure. My son has settled in well and is enjoying his time at the school. This is all down to the wonderful staff who are working so hard to raise the profile of the school after so much bad press.I feel that the school isn't being given a chance to prove itself. Already this year, the school has received an impressive OFSTED report and fantastic exam results. It would be a real shame if the school was to shut without us putting up a fight!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save King Edward VII Upper School, Melton Mowbray from closure."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
